module.name: dbugmsg
module.short: Auxiliary unit for the dbugintf unit.

descr.p: dbugmsg is an auxiliary unit used in the dbugintf unit. It defines the message protocol used between the debug unit and the debug server.

element.name: DebugServerID
element.descr: DebugServerID is a string which is used when creating the message protocol, it is used when identifying the server in the (platform dependent) client-server protocol.

element.name: lctStop
element.descr: lctStop is sent by the client to a server when it disconnects.

element.name: lctInformation
element.descr: lctInformation is the identification of informational messages.

element.name: lctWarning
element.descr: lctWarning is the identification of warning messages.

element.name: lctError
element.descr: lctError is the identification of error messages.

element.name: lctIdentify
element.descr: lctIdentify is sent by the client to a server when it first connects. It's the first message, and contains the name of client application.

element.name: TDebugMessage
element.descr: TDebugMessage is a record that describes the message passed from the client to the server. It should not be passed directly in shared memory, as the string containing the message is allocated on the heap. Instead, the and can be used to read or write the message from/to a stream.

element.name: TDebugMessage.MsgType
element.short: Constant, identifying the type of message

element.name: TDebugMessage.MsgTimeStamp
element.short: Time when the message was generated

element.name: ReadDebugMessageFromStream

descr.p: ReadDebugMessageFromStream reads a record (Msg) from the stream AStream.
The record is not read in a byte-ordering safe way, i.e. it cannot be exchanged between little- and big-endian systems.

element.errors: If the stream contains not enough bytes or is malformed, then an exception may be raised.

element.name: ReadDebugMessageFromStream.AStream
element.short: Stream from which record is read

element.name: ReadDebugMessageFromStream.Msg
element.short: Record to be read from stream

element.name: WriteDebugMessageToStream

descr.p: WriteDebugMessageFromStream writes a record (Msg) to the stream AStream.
The record is not written in a byte-ordering safe way, i.e. it cannot be exchanged between little- and big-endian systems.

element.errors: A stream write error may occur if the stream cannot be written to.

element.name: DebugMessageName
element.short: Return the name of the debug message
element.descr: DebugMessageName returns the name of the message type. It can be used to examine the MsgType field of a record, and if msgType contains a known type, it returns a string describing this type.
element.errors: If MsgType contains an unknown type, 'Unknown' is returned.
